title: Curated Collections
text: Curated Collections is a project to provide a national platform for sustainable digital humanities collections. It is a collaboration between the Australian Research Data Commons and the Sydney Informatics Hub, a Core Research Facility of the University of Sydney, and is part of the ARDC’s HASS and Indigenous Research Data Commons.

title: Curated Collections
text:
How to contact us
Join the project Slack
You can also email m.lynch@sydney.edu.au or register a collection in the repository.

title: Curated Collections
text:
Register a collection
You can let us know about your collection by creating an issue on the Curated Collections GitHub repository:
Issues
If you don’t want to use Git, you can let us know about your interest on Slack or via email.
